name: Super Worm Time Boy
description:
You're Super Worm Time Boy! 

Avoid rocks and nasty critters while spitting your venom and denotating your super cool tail smart bomb. Dig as far as you can for maximum points!

I missed Ludum Dare 48, so I decided to use the theme 'deeper' to make my very first game in a few hours with a little help from my daughter. It was a great learning experience.

Enjoy!
